story_text: Owen the brown owl found a yellow crown in the meadow.
He wore the crown and flew around town, showing it to his friends.
story_images: A brown owl named Owen is sitting in a sunny meadow with a yellow crown lying in the grass next to him.
Owen the owl is flying over a small town, proudly wearing his yellow crown on his head.

questions.question: What did Owen the owl find in the meadow?
What did Owen do after finding the crown?
choices: He showed it to his friends.
He hid it under a tree.
questions.answer: He showed it to his friends.
